Text.val: 12.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
22.08.2003 EE SCR4102 Change GNRL_ACTIVEDATE in GNRL_DEBTORSLISTDATE
-- Build Path/Filename for the CSV file output
-- Delete I/O-File if no records were selected in the childtask

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT cast(SUM(CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTHELL) as decimal(18,2)) FROM :1/cdep WHERE CDEP_ADMNO=:2 AND CDEP_CLNTNO=:3 and CDEP_TYPE = :4
